abilities.name: Extra Smoke
abilities.effect: Any damage done to your Stage 2 Pokémon-ex by your opponent's attacks is reduced by 10 (before applying Weakness and Resistance).

attacks.name: Energy Link
attacks.effect: Search your discard pile for an Energy card and attach it to Kingdra ex.

attacks.name: Protective Swirl
attacks.effect: Kingdra ex has no Weakness during your opponent's next turn.
